content: Cruelty Squad is a first-person shooter game. It seems unrelated to your current Minecraft situation. Would you like to discuss something about Minecraft or take an in-game action?

In Minecraft, sword blocking, also known as 'blocking' reduces damage taken from melee attacks when you're holding a sword in your main hand and in the correct stance. To block, hold your sword and make sure your main hand is empty of any shield. Then, you will block and reduce damage from any mob attacking you.
what do i use the create mod for

The Create mod in Minecraft allows players to build contraptations and automate processes using a variety of components. You can use it to make complex machines and gadgets, and rail systems. It's often used for building elaborate redstone-free factories and other complex devices.
what does curse of vanishing do

The Curse of Vanishing is an enchantment in Minecraft that, when applied to an item, causes it to disappear forever when you die, rather than dropping on the ground for you to retrieve. This means you'll lose the item permanently.
how do i craft a door

To craft a door in Minecraft, you'll need 6 wooden planks of the same type. Arrange them in a vertical column in the crafting grid, filling the top, middle, and bottom rows, but leave the sides empty. This will give you a door that you can place in your world.
what is the easiest way to get alot of spider eyes

One of the easiest ways to get a lot of spider eyes is by killing spiders, which can be found in caves or by exploring at night. You can also try to find spider spawners in abandoned mineshafts, which will allow you to farm spider eyes more efficiently. Alternatively, you can also trade with villagers or explore treasure chests in structures like woodland mansions.
